item.title: Personal Checking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Personal Checking appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.
item.content:encoded:
Personal Checking Account

When it comes to personal checking accounts, The Commercial Bank makes it simple by offering a variety of personal accounts to meet different financial needs and lifestyles.

Regular Checking Account

  • $100 minimum deposit to open
  • No minimum daily balance requirement
  • No monthly maintenance fee
  • Unlimited transactions
  • Free MasterCard® Check Card available upon approval
  • Free Online Banking with Free Bill Pay
  • Free Fraud Watch Plus®– 24 hour debit card monitoring for suspicious activity
  • 24 hour telephone banking

NOW Account

NOW Accounts are minimum balance checking accounts that earn interest.

  • $1,200 minimum deposit to open
  • $1,200 minimum daily balance requirement
  • Daily compounding interest, credited to the account monthly and rate may be subject to change
  • Unlimited number of deposits
  • $7 per month maintenance fee if balance falls below daily balance requirement
  • $0.25 per item fee for each debit in excess of 20 per month if balance falls below daily balance requirement
  • Free MasterCard®Check Card available upon approval
  • Free Online Banking with Free Bill Pay
  • Free Fraud Watch Plus®- 24 hour debit card monitoring for suspicious activity
  • 24 hour telephone banking

Super NOW Account

  • $2,500 minimum deposit to open
  • $2,500 minimum daily balance requirement
  • Daily compounding interest, credited to the account monthly and rate may be subject to change
  • Unlimited number of deposits
  • $7 per month maintenance fee if balance falls below daily balance requirement
  • $0.25 per item fee for each debit in excess of 20 per month if balance falls below daily balance requirement
  • Free MasterCard®Check Card available upon approval
  • Free Online Banking with Free Bill Pay
  • Free Fraud Watch Plus®- 24 hour debit card monitoring for suspicious activity
  • 24 hour telephone banking

The post Personal Checking appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.

item.title: Personal Savings
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Personal Savings appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.
item.content:encoded:
Personal Savings Account

Garanti AK Finans Bank offers traditional personal savings accounts with competitive interest rates. Rest assured that your money is at your finger tips when you need it, and insured by FDIC up to $250,000. Automatic transfer is available for most accounts.

Regular Savings Account

  • $100 minimum deposit to open
  • $100 minimum daily balance requirement
  • Interest will be credited to the account monthly and rate may be subject to change
  • Unlimited number of deposits
  • $5 maintenance fee if the daily balance falls below minimum balance requirement during the month
  • $2 per item fee for each transfer or withdrawal in excess of 3 per month

Savings for Minors Account
We offer a Savings for Minors account which is the easiest way for your child to grow his or her money and learn the value of saving.

  • $25 minimum deposit to open
  • No minimum daily balance required
  • Interest will be credited to the account monthly and rate may be subject to change
  • Unlimited number of deposits
  • $2 per item fee for each transfer or withdrawal in excess of 1 per month
  • Must be under the age 18 and requires a custodian

Money Market Account
A Money Market Account is a savings tool, but has more flexibility than a traditional savings account.

  • $2,500 minimum deposit to open
  • $2,500 minimum daily balance requirement
  • Interest rates are based on tiered balances
  • Interest will be credited to the account monthly and rates are subject to change
  • Unlimited number of deposits
  • $7 per month maintenance fee if balance falls below daily balance requirement
  • Per item fee of $5 for each transfer or withdrawal in excess of 6 during a month

The post Personal Savings appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.

Garanti AK Finans Bank offers many different types of personal loans. Whether you are buying a vehicle, making home improvements or planning a vacation, our consumer lending Loan Officers will work with you to meet your financial needs.

item.title: SBA Loans
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
We understand that when you’re a small business cash flow is always on your mind. With one of the longest business lending terms in the market, we can help you grow your business whilst optimising your repayments. Variable rate commercially secured loans now have a maximum term of 25 years (up from 15 years) Variable...

The post SBA Loans appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.
item.content:encoded:
We understand that when you’re a small business cash flow is always on your mind. With one of the longest business lending terms in the market, we can help you grow your business whilst optimising your repayments.

  • Variable rate commercially secured loans now have a maximum term of 25 years (up from 15 years)
  • Variable rate residentially secured loans now have a maximum term of 30 years (up from 25 years).

Features

  • Borrow from $20,000 and above
  • Fixed or variable rate business loan
  • Flexible repayment options
  • tax benefits.*

The post SBA Loans appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.

Let our Loan Officers help you determine the loan product that will best suit the needs of your...

The post Business Loans appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.
item.content:encoded:
Garanti AK Finans offers Commercial loans for a variety of reasons, including:

  • Business Line of Credit
  • Working Capital
  • Purchasing Equipment
  • Real Estate

Garanti AK Finans understands that business owners face daily challenges in running a successful operation. Let our Loan Officers help you determine the loan product that will best suit the needs of your business.

The post Business Loans appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.

item.title: Business Checking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Business Checking appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.
item.content:encoded:
Business Checking

When it comes to checking services, we makes it simple. Garanti AK Finans Bank offers free checking for your business.

Small Business Checking

  • $250 minimum deposit to open
  • No minimum daily balance requirement
  • A per item fee of $0.30 will be charged for each debit, credit and deposited item in excess of 150 items in the month
  • Free MasterCard® Check Card available upon approval
  • Free Online Banking with Free Bill Pay
  • Free Fraud Watch Plus® – 24 hour debit card monitoring for suspicious activity
  • 24 hour telephone banking

The post Business Checking appeared first on Garant Finans Bank.
